# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your needs perfectly. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its worth to you is $120, I am offering it to you for $140. This price reflects the excellent value and benefits you will receive from using this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140.

(2) Reject Alice's offer
